block.p: HASBRO, Pawtucket, R.I., named Alfred Verrecchia, chief financial officer, to be president and chief operating officer. He succeeds Herbert Baum, who became chairman and chief executive at Dial Corp.
MALAN REALTY INVESTORS, Bingham Farms, Mich., named Michael Kaline, vice president, to the post of president. He succeeds Anthony Gramer, who left his post as president and chief executive in May.

E. W. SCRIPPS, Cincinnati, named Kenneth W. Lowe, president, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds William R. Burleigh, who is retiring but will continue as chairman.
TVN ENTERTAINMENT CORP., Burbank, Calif., named Ian B. Aaron president and chief executive. He was most recently president at SoftNet Systems.
